body:
#1018 mumble hangs on start up

How long did you wait before killing it?

I have an issue with Windows enabling QoS taking a long time - which also makes Mumble unresponsive for quite some several seconds.

Could you check the log in %APPDATA%\Mumble\Console.txt
And launch Dbgview.exe alongside Mumble, and post (the last lines of) the log here as well?
- Debug View http://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/sysinternals/bb896647.aspx
